welcome_message_body: Welcome to Worthing, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant arts scene, and rich history. We invite you to explore our picturesque streets, soak up the sun, and enjoy all that Worthing has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Fish Factory
restaurants.description: The Fish Factory is a seafood restaurant located in Worthing.
restaurants.address: 51 Brighton Rd, Worthing, West Sussex, BN11 3EE

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport offers exclusive services for private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
